product_name: Giro Sica Mountain Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: The tough and versatile Giro Sica mountain bike shoes have stiff carbon fiber soles to maximize power transfer and offer a women-specific, easily adjustable fit for your riding comfort. Lightweight microfiber synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers give a glovelike fit with excellent breathability; welded scuff guards offer added durability. Molded EVA footbeds include a fit kit with 3 different-size arch supports, allowing you to choose the amount of support needed. Carbon fiber soles offer more rigidity than a nylon sole, providing a direct connection with the pedal and solid power transfer. High traction outsole lugs enhance grip and durability on trails and in muddy conditions; soles also accept toe spikes for 'cross season or winter riding. Strong and secure ratcheting buckle allows precise on-the-fly adjustability; buckle is replaceable. 2 rip-and-stick closure straps provide a solid, secure fit over insteps and are offset to maximize comfort and minimize pressure points. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps deter odors. Giro Sica mountain bike shoes are compatible with 2-bolt cleats; please note that cleats are not included (cleats typically come with pedals).
short_description: The tough and versatile Giro Sica mountain bike shoes have stiff carbon fiber soles to maximize power transfer and offer a women-specific, easily adjustable fit for your riding comfort.
